casebody.data:
Anne Wehle ABOFF and Jonathan F. Wehle, as guardians for Susan U. Wehle, Appellants,
v.
PNC BANK NATIONAL ASSOCIATION, and Christina S. Lavery, as trustee of the Christina S. Lavery Revocable Trust, Appellees. Case No. 2D17-338 District Court of Appeal of Florida, Second District. Opinion filed January 24, 2018

DECISION WITHOUT PUBLISHED OPINION

Affirmed.
